mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scheduler(num, user_num, subject, created, color, check_in, check_out, memo) VALUES(scheduler_seq.NEXTVAL,#{user_num}, #{subject}, SYSDATE, #{color},#{check_in, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{check_out, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select num, user_num, subject, TO_CHAR(created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created, color, TO_CHAR(check_in,'YYYY-MM-DD')check_in, TO_CHAR(check_out,'YYYY-MM-DD')check_out, memo FROM scheduler WHERE user_num = #{user_num} ORDER BY check_in ASC, num DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM scheduler WHERE num=#{num} AND user_num=#{user_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mate(num, user_num, subject, content, ctgNum, created, people_num, current_num, start_date, end_date,answer) VALUES(mate_seq.NEXTVAL, #{user_num}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{ctgNum}, SYSDATE, #{people_num}, 0, #{start_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{end_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR},0)
INSERT INTO mate_reply(reply_num, user_num, mate_num, content, created, reply) VALUES (mate_reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{user_num}, #{num}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT num, m.user_num, subject, content, ctgNum, TO_CHAR(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD')created, people_num, current_num, TO_CHAR(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')start_date, TO_CHAR(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')end_date, nickName FROM mate m JOIN member1 m1 ON m.user_num = m1.userNum ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROW FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
UPDATE mate SET answer = answer+1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE mate SET answer =#{answer} WHERE num=#{mate_num}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mate WHERE num=#{num} AND user_num = #{user_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mate_reply(reply_num, user_num, mate_num, content, created,reply_answer) VALUES (mate_reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{user_num}, #{mate_num}, #{content}, SYSDATE,#{reply_answer})
mapper.select: SELECT reply_num, r.user_num, r.mate_num, r.content, r.reply_answer, r.created, nickName FROM mate_reply r LEFT JOIN mate m ON r.mate_num = m.num LEFT OUTER JOIN member1 m ON m.userNum = r.user_num WHERE r.mate_num = #{mate_num} ORDER BY reply_num DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM mate_reply WHERE mate_num = #{mate_num}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM mate_reply WHERE reply_answer = #{reply_answer}
mapper.update: UPDATE mate_reply SET content=#{content} WHERE mate_num = #{mate_num} AND reply_num = #{reply_num}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mate_reply WHERE reply_num=#{reply_num} AND mate_num = #{mate_num}
